original: 啟稟大人，<color=#fff999>$leader1</color>竟敢拒絕本將的招募，來日定要教訓一番，使其下跪求饒！(<color=#bceea7>招募失敗</color>)
text: Master Qi, <color=#fff999>$leader1</color> dared to refuse the recruitment of this general. In the future, I will teach you a lesson and make him kneel and beg for mercy! (<color=#bceea7>Recruitment failed</color>)
